## Configuration Options

| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|--------|------|---------|-------------|
| `option_name` | string | `"default"` | What this option controls |
| `another_option` | boolean | `true` | When to enable/disable |
| `numeric_option` | integer | `100` | Valid range and impact |

### Configuration Example

```yaml
# config.yaml
feature_name:
  option_name: "custom_value"
  another_option: false
  numeric_option: 200
```
